section.p: Record a macro with the name PercentageFormat that is formatting a numeric value as a percentage with 1 decimal and also centers the content in the cell.

section.title: Answer
section.codeblock: Sub PercentageFormat() ' ' Numeric value formatted as percentage with 1 dec. and horizontally centered ' Selection.NumberFormat = "0.0%" With Selection .HorizontalAlignment = xlCenter End With End Sub

section.title: Solution
section.p: Right click on a cell and choose Format Cells tab Number Percentage with 1 decimal tab Alignment Horizontal: Center OK .
